author: Source: Guardian-series.co.uk
title: Former Real Madrid great Raul announces retirement - Guardian-series.co.uk
text:
The former Spain striker, 38, joined the Cosmos of the North American Soccer League, a level below Major League Soccer, in December but has decided to call it a day after a single campaign. "When I signed for the New York Cosmos in December, I said I would evaluate how I felt towards the end of the year and assess whether I would continue to play," he said.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Guardian-series.co.uk.
